public class IncidentManagementServiceImpl
extends Object

      • newWorkProductVersion

        public void newWorkProductVersion(String workProductID,
                         Integer subscriptionId)
        New work product version. Checks if a subscription was made for a pending update and if so, cancels the subscription, sends incident state change notifications and remove pending update requests. When there is new version of Incident document, we need to update the Incident and Interest Group Models.
        Specified by:
        newWorkProductVersion in interface com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.service.PubSubNotificationService
        Parameters:
        workProductID - the work product id
        subscriptionId - the subscription id

      • shareIncident

        public boolean shareIncident(org.uicds.incidentManagementService.ShareIncidentRequestDocument.ShareIncidentRequest shareIncidentRequest)
                      throws com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.UICDSException
        Share incident. Adds the core to be shared with to the list of shared cores and re-publish the incident work product This method does not set the agreement checked parameter so interest group state notifications are not triggered.
        Specified by:
        shareIncident in interface IncidentManagementService
        Parameters:
        shareIncidentRequest - the share incident request
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:
        com.saic.uicds.core.infrastructure.exceptions.UICDSException - the UICDS exception
